data.name: Miss Neko 2 - Free Bonus Content
data.detailed_description:
♥New Neko!♥

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2022180/Miss_Neko_3/


About the Game

Feed your cats with their favorite foods, then the miracle will happen!

Install the free DLC to unlock some adult contents :)

Thank you very much for supporting ”Miss Neko” series.
Please leave your comments to help us improve!

data.short_description: Feed your cats with their favorite foods, then the miracle will happen!
data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese*, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
- This Game may contain some sex implications not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
- The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
